select to_char(paymentdate,'mm') as "pMonth", count(*) as "pCount" ,to_char(sum(total_amt) ,'L9,999,999') as "pSum" from payment where to_char(paymentdate,'yyyymm') between '201801' and '201812' group by to_char(paymentdate,'mm') order by to_char(paymentdate,'mm') asc
